title: Manage Hazardous Materials Inventory
description: A wholesaler deals in chemical products that are classified as hazardous materials. An agent must ensure they are stored and handled correctly.

tasks.description: When receiving a hazardous material, verify that it has the correct safety data sheet (SDS) and labeling.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker confirms all compliance documentation is present.

tasks.description: Store the material in the designated, specially equipped hazardous materials section of the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: The material is stored according to safety regulations.

tasks.description: When shipping a hazardous material, use the correct packaging and generate the required hazardous materials shipping papers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is packed and labeled in compliance with transportation regulations.
